name: Vertical Floor
description:
Disclaimer: The browser version is unstable and only works sometimes! We really recommend downloading the pc build!

Vertical floor is an action platformer where you perform a combination of movement based abilities made available by a rich character controller, in order to slice through enemies and style your way to the finish line on time.

You play as a rogue robot training for a big heist, in his simulation chamber. Pick up energy canisters to increase your movement abilities’ effectiveness!
Blue canisters increase speed, yellow increases jump height, red increases Dash length, green increases Climbing duration, and teal increases grappling hook range

The objective of the game is to collect enough energy canisters to power on the portal at the end of any given level, and reaching it, before the simulation destabilizes.

Controls: Horizontal movement: wasd
Jumping: space
Dashing: shift
Wallrunning: jump onto any wall at an angle, press space to launch off it
Wallclimbing: jump face first into a wall and hold space
Slo-Mo: e to toggle on and off
Grappling hook: g
Inspect weapon: f

Credits:

3D assets: Anton Meineche Falk, Olivia Hjort Axelsen, Storm Soendergaard, Dave "FreshBone"

Animation: Olivia Hjort Axelsen

Programming: Storm Soendergaard, Olivia Hjort Axelsen

Worldbuilding: Rasmus Kromand Mogensen, Dave "FreshBone"

Leveldesign & Environment art: Anton Meineche Falk 

Trailer: Dave "FreshBone"

2D Art: Rasmus Kromand Mogensen

Music and sound: Befly
